name: Nincada

conditions.value: when its trainer has an empty pokeball when Nincada evolves into Ninjask

effects.value: the Shedinja has all the base statistics that are in its stat block, plus any health and Ability Score Increases it would obtain from leveling up from its minimum found level

description: The Trainee Pokémon. Nincada lives underground for many years in complete darkness. This Pokémon absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless as it waits for evolution.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: This Pokémon gets an additional +1 to attack rolls.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.
